CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 2, 1952, pg. 11, reads: "Garden Party Attracts Hundreds - The famed Metoka Club held its ninth annual Scholarship Garden Party last Thursday at the Prince Hall Temple, 157 Larimer Avenue, with over 800 persons attending. Almost $1,000 in scholarship awards were given ten worthy college students... The picture at the right shows some of the huge crowd who witnessed the presentation . - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Women and men seated in wooden folding chairs around woman speaking at microphone, in yard of Prince Hall Temple, for Metoka Club Scholarship Garden Party, 157 Larimer Avenue
